entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the afternoon then clearing. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
